description: Congratulations! You're clearly a super maths whizz genius pants - keep up the awesome work!
Well done, you're above average! Good on you for beating those losers at the bottom.
You're not terrible at maths, but you're not that great either. Keep trying!
Ok, you didn't get absolutely nil, but you've defintiely got some work to do. Maybe it's time to hit the books...
Hmm, someone's not great at maths, are they?
